remarks: Universal quantification over a restricted class abstraction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
statement:
ralab2.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ralrab2 $p |- ( A. x e. { y e. A | ph } ps <-> A. y e. A ( ph -> ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
$d ps y $.
$d x y $.
